CustomField.formula:
IF(OR( Role__c = "Marketing (Corporate)", Role__c = "Marketing (Las Vegas)", Role__c = "Marketing (Los Angeles)", Role__c = "Marketing (Riverside)", Role__c = "Marketing (San Diego)", Role__c = "Director of Business Development (SoCal)"), "Brittany deBoer",
IF(OR( Role__c = "Marketing (Denver)", Role__c = "Marketing (Sacramento)", Role__c = "Marketing (San Francisco)", Role__c = "Marketing (San Jose)", Role__c = "Marketing (Seattle)", Role__c = "Director of Business Development (North West)"),"Linda Doi-Scheid",
IF(OR( Role__c = "Marketing (Corporate-Env)", Role__c = "Director of Business Development (Environmental)"), "Tom Sandoval",
IF(OR( Role__c = "Marketing (Dallas)", Role__c = "Marketing (Houston)", Role__c = "Marketing (Phoenix)", Role__c = "Marketing (Tucson)", Role__c = "Director of Business Development (Central)"),"Kelley Amey",
IF(Role__c = "Marketing (Managed Repair Program)", "Jean Greenberg",
IF(OR( Role__c = "Marketing (Chicago)", Role__c = "Marketing (New England)", Role__c = "Marketing (Philadelphia)", Role__c = "Marketing (Tampa)", Role__c = "Director of Business Development (Eastern)"), "Jamie Moore",
""))))))
CustomField.label: BDD
